title: The world’s next food superpower
selftext: What are your thoughts on this topic? Good to see something different than the usual snide article from this publication.
comments:
Oh yes totally.

Except whats the use when we have kids dying from hunger and starvation just like Bangladesh and pokemonistan 

Govt isn't banning sucrose addition in baby formulas as fillers.

The food prices are at 20% inflation for like last 10 yrs.

A simple kebab available for 1 rupees per kebab in 2010 is like 10 rupees now 
A rumali roti was 1 rupees and now at minimum 5 usually  8-10.
